title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations       Exhibit Films  The following short films are part of the exhibits installed in 2016 at the visitor center.                         Meet The Missileers In this short film, former USAF personnel share their stories of working in the missile field of South Dakota during the Cold War.   Duration:6 minutes, 28 seconds                                Atomic A to Z This short film displays US and Soviet atomic weapons tests from 1945 through 1963, displaying the dramatic increase in destructive power that was developed.  Duration:3 minutes, 19 seconds               Park Films The following short films give an introduction to Minuteman Missile National Historic Site and the role of nuclear missiles during the Cold War.                        Missiles of SAC This is a short film of the missiles under Strategic Air Command.   Duration:1 minute, 29 seconds                                Open the Door This short film gives a brief introduction on the Minuteman Missile National Historic Site.   Duration:2 minutes, 23 seconds                                Secrets on the Prairie  The Minuteman Missiles in South Dakota's prairie stood ready at a moment’s notice during the Cold War. They were not hidden, but not announced.   Duration:2 minutes, 25 seconds                                Partners For Peace A 2008 park-produced introductory film shown to the public until 2015.  Duration:9 minutes, 47 seconds                                What's a Minuteman? Easy to understand Cold War 101  Duration:12 minutes, 56 seconds
